title: Reimagining Cities as Regenerative Ecosystems
subtitle: Regenerative Book Review — Urban Jungle by Ben Wilson
featuredImageAlt: Urban Jungle — Reimagining Cities as Regenerative Ecosystems, by Ben Wilson
excerpt: Ben Wilson’s Urban Jungle challenges us to rethink our relationship with urban environments, presenting cities as dynamic ecosystems capable of fostering biodiversity and resilience in harmony with humans and the built environment.
